# age

**Type Property**

An element that represents the user’s age, in years.

## Declaration

```swift
class var age: PKIdentityElement { get }
```

## Getting an age identity element

- **age(atLeast:)**: Returns an element that represents the user’s age is at least the age you specify.

items.description: Returns an element that represents the user’s age is at least the age you specify.
items.name: age(atLeast:)

title: age
